You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesT T] > &theta;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Theta;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0398/index.htm U+00398].
  * `&theta;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03b8/index.htm U+003B8].
